text: "Better Life" is a song co-written and recorded by Australian country music artist Keith Urban. It was released on July 25, 2005 as the fourth single from his 2004 album Be Here. ==Music video== The music video premiered on CMT on October 13, 2005. The video debuted at number 18 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of October 27, 2005. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for two consecutive weeks in January 2006. ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Country songs Category:Keith Urban songs
title: Better Life
